email.title: Graduate and Summer Internship Programmes at LSEG - Deadline This Sunday!
email.text:
The applications for all graduate roles and summer 2020 internships at London Stock Exchange Group are closing **this Sunday Dec 1st!** We encourage all interested applications to finalize their applications soon.
Check out the details below for more information and how to apply.
email.heading: Graduate and Summer Internships at London Stock Exchange Group
email.text:
We are looking for motivated students with a real interest in technology and financial markets to join our 2020 nine-week Summer Internship Programme.
From Artificial Intelligence to Blockchain, Machine Learning to high-speed trading platforms, being a technologist at London Stock Exchange Group (LSEG) means being part of an exciting team thatâ€™s shaping the fast-changing future of the global financial services markets.
Our technology internship programme offers you unique exposure to a wide variety of leading technical, analytical and project management career path opportunities. You could find yourself working on cyber security, introducing leading cutting-edge software or helping to implement Robotic Process Automation and much more.
As well as the formal induction training and two four week rotations across our business we offer a range of other development programmes within our friendly and supportive workplace environment.
Whichever way you look at it, this is an incredible platform from which to launch your career.
Learn more today: [lseg.com/graduates](https://www.lseg.com/careers/graduate-and-internship-programmes).
